text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6e4cfffe809a894ea831fc8011527714481d2857|patch 8.2.1412: Vim: not operator does not result in boolean>
patch 8.2.1412: Vim: not operator does not result in boolean

Problem:    Vim: not operator does not result in boolean.
Solution:   Make type depend on operator. (issue 6678)  Fix using "false" and
            "true" in Vim9 script.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1412: Vim: not operator does not result in boolean · vim/vim@6e4cfff
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1412: Vim: not operator does not result in boolean · vim/vim@6e4cfff
attachments.text: Problem: Vim: not operator does not result in boolean. Solution: Make type depend on operator. (issue 6678) Fix using "false" and "true" in Vim9 script.

patch 8.2.1409: nmpmrc and php.ini filetypes not recognized

Problem:    Nmpmrc and php.ini filetypes not recognized.
Solution:   Add filetype detection. (Doug Kearns)

patch 8.2.1408: Vim9: type casting not supported

Problem:    Vim9: type casting not supported.
Solution:   Introduce type casting.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/127542bcebeb6480493b09d75a3be1d98a5f7797|patch 8.2.1407: Vim9: type of list and dict only depends on first item>
patch 8.2.1407: Vim9: type of list and dict only depends on first item

Problem:    Vim9: type of list and dict only depends on first item.
Solution:   Use all items to decide about the type.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.1407: Vim9: type of list and dict only depends on first item · vim/vim@127542b
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: type of list and dict only depends on first item. Solution: Use all items to decide about the type.
